# Discord Tools (Jackybot)

> Free, privacy-focused online video utilities optimized for Discord users. No sign-up required.

## Tools

### 1. 8MB Video Compressor
- **URL**: https://www.jackybot.xyz/8mb
- **Purpose**: Compresses video files to under 8MB (or 25MB/50MB/100MB) to meet Discord's file size limits without Nitro.
- **Key Features**:
  - Supports MP4, AV1, AVIF, WebP, GIF.
  - Client-side processing (privacy focused) or cloud acceleration.
  - Maintains high visual quality.

### 2. Clip That (Video Trimmer)
- **URL**: https://www.jackybot.xyz/clip
- **Purpose**: Interactive tool to trim/crop video clips for social media sharing.
- **Key Features**:
  - Visual timeline editor.
  - Precise start/end time selection.
  - Instant preview.

## Usage
The site is designed for direct end-user interaction via a web browser. API access is not currently public.

## Technical Context
- **Stack**: Python (Flask), ffmpeg, Vanilla JS.
- **Privacy**: We prioritize user privacy. Files are processed securely and not stored permanently.
